title: fix: Let users select version number and build in About Dialog

issue.title: Selectable version number for easy copy/paste
issue.body:
### Project

Deskflow

### What problem are you trying to solve?

When reporting a bug, I have to type the version number manually increasing the potential for a typo.

### What solution do you propose?

Make the version number text selectable so I can copy/paste it... or better still, also add a one-click copy button next to it.

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/15ac50d1-a85f-43cd-b3a3-8670d551049c)
